categories: Category:Venator-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: The Tenacious was a Venator-class Star Destroyer in operation during the early stages of the Galactic Empire. It was helmed by Captain Denimoor.

The Tenacious was illegally redirected to Arkinnea to aid the Jedi Master K'Kruhk and his younglings as a favor from the Imperial officer stationed at the planet, Teron, due to the two of them formerly serving under the Whipid Jedi Master during the Siege of Saleucami.
